mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Drake, Isaac Patient Age: 21. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Gun shot flesh wound of left lumbar region bullet entering 2 inches above crest of illium [ilium] passing towards [two words illegible] 2 inches from the 5 lumbar vertebra.. Location Wounded: In act[ion] at Winchester, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/07/20. Nature of Wound: Bullet. Result: Transferred to Parkersburg 1864/09/27.
